name: 1 Button Baseball
description:
1 Button Baseball is a game where you swing a bat to hit a ball.

Press the mouse button to swing and depending on the timing it will launch the ball at a specific angle.

Hit the Home Run target to gain extra points.

Originally was made for the 1-Button Jam 2022 (Challenge was only 1 button can be used) - https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam-2022
